name: Rab Superlite Emergency 2-Person Shelter
description: Ambushed by a sudden storm in the alpine? Trying to lunch in rude weather? Pop this shelter out of your pack. Simply sit inside to anchor and support it and you’re instantly out of the wind and wet.Made of ultralight silnylon fabric that is waterproof and windproof.Flaps that you sit on to anchor it are fully waterproof.Safety orange colour and reflective piping are easily visible day or night.Vents let in air but not weather.Built-in stuff sack.
